title: dodgers...
body: hello! I just recently went into queue and my trio got our roles but one of my mates gets a role before another(SUPRISE they fought over support) so he decided to go top but he said "fk u ill throw" not sure if it was a threat or a fact but we didn't risk it so we dodged. after that experience I thought of an idea not sure if it will be liked but what if we can chose to kick a player out of our team(during champ select) and take a vote. the thing I wouldn't like about this would be the power every pre-made gets(like my trio) abusing, trolling etc  but put in comments what do you think?
